text:
@Mike_Pence Once you’re born, this Administration has no concern for you: children in cages, people dying of Covid19, our armed service members’ welfare ignored as Russia pays bounties for their deaths, and resuming executions during a pandemic.

Pro-control of women’s bodies ≠ Pro-life
